doc.field: Includes HRL swimming; immediately after getting out of water; standing behind cacti and shrubs without a shirt; sitting behind an NBC microphone; a group shot with men in tuxedos; sitting at a table with Wilson Hicks and a woman; standing next to Roy Larsen; standing next to unidentified children and adults; holding a chicken; a line of children with Henry Luce III and Ann Brokaw; playing tennis; various portraits where HRL is wearing a suit; HRL and Clare Boothe Luce arriving aboard the ship the "Queen Mary" from Europe; shots of various individuals with and without HRL and of nature at his estate in Mepkin, South Carolina taken by Mary Fraser Longwell; HRL in swimming trunks in front of a surfing board with two other men; holding a dead goose; lying on a beach; reading a newspaper; adjusting a radio dial?; sitting on rocks in bathing trunks, pulling in a shark; sleeping on a couch?; wearing Hawaiian leis; hanging off a wooden fence; various group shots with HRL and HRL talking to individuals; standing opposite Jo Davidson next to his bust; slamming a mallet at a strongman game in an amusement park; wearing a suit with dog in the foreground; and HRL riding a bicycle in shorts.
Series IX. Photographs >> Photos - At Leisure (4 folders)
